title: Retrieve your profile information
description: Retrieves full statistics and profile information for the authenticated user.
permission_required: MyTradeMeRead: Read your membership & listing data.

query.name: return_member_profile
query.description: If true, also returns the member's public profile information (occupation, bio, photo, etc).

returns.description: <MemberSummary> The user's name, email address, bought, sold and feedback stats.

fields.name: WatchListCount
fields.description: The number of items on the watchlist.

fields.name: WonCount
fields.description: The number of items won.

fields.name: LostCount
fields.description: The number of items lost.

fields.name: SellingCount
fields.description: The number of items being sold.

fields.name: SoldCount
fields.description: The number of items sold.

fields.name: UnsoldCount
fields.description: The number of items unsold.

fields.name: PositiveFeedback
fields.description: The total positive feedback.

fields.name: NegativeFeedback
fields.description: The total negative feedback.

fields.name: TotalFeedback
fields.description: The total feedback (positive - negative).

fields.name: MemberId
fields.description: The ID of the member.

fields.name: Nickname
fields.description: The member's nickname.

fields.name: DateJoined
fields.description: The date the member registered for an account on Trade Me.

fields.name: DateAddressVerified
fields.description: The date and time the member became address verified, if they are address verified.

fields.name: IsAddressVerified
fields.description: Indicates whether the member is address verified. This means the member entered a code that was delivered via the postal system to the member's street address. Note that currently, members retain their address verified status if they move, so having this status doesn't necessarily mean that the member's current address is valid.

fields.name: Balance
fields.description: The member's Trade Me account balance.

fields.name: PayNowBalance
fields.description: The member's Pay Now account balance.

fields.name: FirstName
fields.description: The member's first name.

fields.name: LastName
fields.description: The member's last name.

fields.name: FixedPriceOffers
fields.description: The number of fixed price offers for the member.

fields.name: Email
fields.description: The email address for the member.

fields.name: Gender
fields.description: The gender of the member.

fields.name: MembershipAddress
fields.description: The member's primary address.

fields.name: Name
fields.type:
Name 
 String or null 

The name of the person whom the item is being delivered to.



 Address1 
 String or null 

The first line of the address.



 Address2 
 String or null 

The second line of the address (optional).



 Suburb 
 String or null 

The suburb (optional).



 City 
 String or null 

The city.



 Postcode 
 String or null 

The postcode (optional).



 Country 
 String or null 

The country (currently restricted to "New Zealand" or "Australia").



 IsMembershipAddress 
 Boolean 

Indicates whether this address is a membership address. This type of address is comprised of address details that are supplied when registering an account. Do not supply this value when adding or updating a delivery address.
fields.description: String or null

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the person whom the item is being delivered to.

fields.name: Address1
fields.description: The first line of the address.

fields.name: Address2
fields.description: The second line of the address (optional).

fields.name: Suburb
fields.description: The suburb (optional).

fields.name: City
fields.description: The city.

fields.name: Postcode
fields.description: The postcode (optional).

fields.name: Country
fields.description: The country (currently restricted to "New Zealand" or "Australia").

fields.name: IsMembershipAddress
fields.description: Indicates whether this address is a membership address. This type of address is comprised of address details that are supplied when registering an account. Do not supply this value when adding or updating a delivery address.

fields.name: IsBusiness
fields.description: Indicates whether the member has registered as a business.

fields.name: BusinessName
fields.description: The member's business name (business memberships only).

fields.name: BillingAddress
fields.description: The member's billing address (business memberships only). This is optional even for business memberships. If it doesn't exist, assume the billing address is the same as the delivery address.

fields.name: ClosestLocality
fields.description: The name of the closest locality to the member. Based on the "Closest town" information supplied by the member when creating their account.

fields.name: ClosestDistrict
fields.description: The name of the closest district to the member. Based on the "Closest town" information supplied by the member when creating their account.

fields.name: ClosestDistrictId
fields.description: The ID of the closest district to the member. Based on the "Closest town" information supplied by the member when creating their account.

fields.name: IsAuthenticated
fields.description: Indicates whether the member is authenticated.

fields.name: IsPayNowAccepted
fields.description: Indicates whether the member can accept Pay Now payments.

fields.name: FavouriteSearchCount
fields.description: The number of saved searches in the member's favourites.

fields.name: FavouriteCategoryCount
fields.description: The number of saved categories in the member's favourites.

fields.name: FavouriteSellerCount
fields.description: The number of saved sellers in the member's favourites.

fields.name: AutoBillingEnabled
fields.description: Indicates whether the member has set up auto-billing.

fields.name: CanListClearanceItems
fields.description: Indicates whether the member can list clearance items using the IsClearance flag. This is currently only for certain elite sellers.

fields.name: IsTopSeller
fields.description: Indicates whether the member is currently a registered top seller.

fields.name: IsRegisteredWineSeller
fields.description: Indicates whether the member is currently a registered wine seller. This will be false if the member has not registered, or if the registration has been disabled, or if the off-license has expired, or if the member cannot accept Pay Now payments.

fields.name: IsPropertyAgent
fields.description: Indicates whether the member is registered as a property agent.

fields.name: IsRentalAgent
fields.description: Indicates whether the member is registered as a rental agent.

fields.name: IsJobAgent
fields.description: Indicates whether the member is registered as a job agent.

fields.name: CreditCardType
fields.description: If the user has a saved credit card that they can use, contains the card type ("Visa", "MasterCard", etc). Will be omitted if the user does not have a saved card.

fields.name: CreditCardLastFourDigits
fields.description: If the user has a saved credit card, contains the last four digits of the card number (e.g. "1234"). Will be omitted if the user does not have a saved card.

fields.name: CreditCardExpiryMonth
fields.description: If the user has a saved credit card, contains the month when it expires (1 = January, 12 = December).

fields.name: CreditCardExpiryYear
fields.description: If the user has a saved credit card, contains the year when it expires.

fields.name: RecentSearchesEnabled
fields.description: Indicates whether recent searches are recorded against the user's profile.

fields.name: HighVolumeListingCount
fields.description: The number of active listings the member has which contribute towards the high volume threshold. Generally speaking, auctions contribute towards the high volume threshold while classifieds do not. Some categories are exempt; listings within those categories do not count towards the threshold either.

fields.name: HighVolumeThreshold
fields.description: The user's high volume listing allowance. This is the number of active listings you can have without incurring a high volume listing fee (this fee is charged for each new listing). All classifieds and auctions in some categories are exempt from high volume listing fees.

fields.name: CanRemoveBids
fields.description:
Indicates whether the member can remove bids using the remove bid API.

                                This field will always return true.

fields.name: ShoppingCartCount
fields.description: The number of items in the members cart.

fields.name: IsInTrade
fields.description: Indicates whether the member is a professional trader. If they are a professional trader then their listings are protected by the Consumer Guarantees Act.

fields.name: MemberProfile
fields.description: This member's public profile information.

fields.name: Occupation
fields.type:
Occupation 
 String or null 

The occupation of the member.



 Biography 
 String or null 

The member's bio.



 Quote 
 String or null 

The member's favourite quote.



 Photo 
 String or null 

A URL representing the member's photo.
fields.description: String or null

fields.name: Occupation
fields.description: The occupation of the member.

fields.name: Biography
fields.description: The member's bio.

fields.name: Quote
fields.description: The member's favourite quote.

fields.name: Photo
fields.description: A URL representing the member's photo.

fields.name: ExternalTrackingToken
fields.description: An external tracking token used to uniquely identify a member without exposing member information.

fields.name: LandlinePhoneNumber
fields.description: The member's landline phone number.

fields.name: MobilePhoneNumber
fields.description: The member's mobile phone number.

fields.name: MemberToken
fields.description: The members token

fields.name: TradevineAccountType
fields.description: The member's Tradevine account type (Tradevine, MyProducts or neither)

enum.name: NotRegistered
enum.description: Not registered with a Tradevine account

fields.name: DraftSummary
fields.description: The number of items lost.

fields.name: DraftCount
fields.type:
DraftCount 
 Integer 

current number of drafts



 DraftLimit 
 Integer 

the maximum limit of drafts allowed for each member
fields.description: Integer

fields.name: DraftCount
fields.description: current number of drafts

fields.name: DraftLimit
fields.description: the maximum limit of drafts allowed for each member

fields.name: JobProfiles
fields.description: The member's job profiles

fields.name: ProfileId
fields.type:
ProfileId 
 Integer 

The id of the profile



 Key 
 String or null 

A key to identify the profile
fields.description: Integer

fields.name: ProfileId
fields.description: The id of the profile

fields.name: Key
fields.description: A key to identify the profile

fields.name: AvailableExternalPaymentProviders
fields.description: List of deferred payments the member can use

fields.name: MemberTokens
fields.description: The collection of member tokens a member has for external services

fields.name: Service
fields.type:
Service 
 Enumeration 

The service the token is for.



 Token 
 Guid 

The token used for the service to uniquely identify the member.
fields.description: Enumeration

fields.name: Service
fields.description: The service the token is for.

enum.name: Sentry
enum.description: The token is for use with the sentry.io service.

enum.name: GoogleAnalytics
enum.description: The token is for use with GA (Google Analytics)

enum.name: ExternalSearch
enum.description: The token is for use with external search

enum.name: ListingCollections
enum.description: The token is for use with the listing collections service

enum.name: InternalServices
enum.description: The token is for use with Trade Me internal services.

fields.name: Token
fields.description: The token used for the service to uniquely identify the member.

fields.name: LoyaltySubscriptionDetails
fields.description: The member's loyalty subscription details.

fields.name: IsMemberEligibleForNewSubscription
fields.type:
IsMemberEligibleForNewSubscription 
 Boolean 

Indicates whether the member is eligible for a new loyalty subscription



 Subscription 
 <LoyaltySubscriptionDetail> or null 

Return the current member subscription






 Id 
 Integer 

Subscription Id



 Status 
 Enumeration 

Status of the subscription



 SubscribedAt 
 DateTime 

When the subscription was purchased



 ExpiresAt 
 DateTime 

When the subscription expires



 Product 
 <LoyaltyProductDetail> or null 

Product details for the current subscription






 Id 
 Integer 

Product ID

                                This field is deprecated.
                            



 Price 
 Number 

Product price per PaymentInterval unit

                                This field is deprecated.
                            



 PaymentInterval 
 <LoyaltyPaymentIntervalDetail> or null 

String representation of the subscription period

                                This field is deprecated.
                            






 Description 
 String or null 

Description of the payment interval in a friendly format

                                This field is deprecated.
                            



 IntervalType 
 Enumeration 

The type of payment interval

                                This field is deprecated.
                            



 IntervalsPerPayment 
 Integer 

The number of payment intervals between payments

                                This field is deprecated.
                            






 Benefits 
 Collection of <LoyaltyBenefitDetail> or null 

Benefits provided by this product.

                                This field is deprecated.
                            






 Type 
 Enumeration 

Type of benefit

                                This field is deprecated.
                            



 SubsidyLimit 
 Number 

The maximum shipping subsidy given by this benefit

                                This field is deprecated.
                            



 IsUnlimited 
 Boolean or null 

Indicates whether the free success fee benefit is unlimited

                                This field is deprecated.
                            



 Quota 
 Integer or null 

The total number of free success fee sales benefits available

                                This field is deprecated.
                            



 QuotaRemaining 
 Integer or null 

The remaining number of free success fee sales benefits available

                                This field is deprecated.
fields.description: Boolean

fields.name: TaxLiabilities
fields.description: The taxes that Trade Me will collect automatically on behalf of this member when they sell on Trade Me

fields.name: Type
fields.type:
Type 
 Enumeration 

The type of tax that is included



 Country 
 String or null 

The country that is levying the tax e.g. NZ



 Name 
 String or null 

The name of the tax e.g. GST



 FlatRate 
 Number 

The rate at which the tax is charged (as a decimal e.g 0.15)



 Description 
 String or null 

A string that can be used as a caption where necessary



 IsSellRestrictionsEffective 
 Boolean 

Whether certain features like auction, unspecified shipping, pickups, non hosted payment methods should be restricted



 IsTaxEffective 
 Boolean 

Whether the effective date for the tax has been reached e.g. 1st Dec for NZ GST
fields.description: Enumeration

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of tax that is included

enum.name: NZ_GST_Overseas_Supplies
enum.description: New Zealand GST on overseas supplies

fields.name: Country
fields.description: The country that is levying the tax e.g. NZ

fields.name: Name
fields.description: The name of the tax e.g. GST

fields.name: FlatRate
fields.description: The rate at which the tax is charged (as a decimal e.g 0.15)

fields.name: Description
fields.description: A string that can be used as a caption where necessary

fields.name: IsSellRestrictionsEffective
fields.description: Whether certain features like auction, unspecified shipping, pickups, non hosted payment methods should be restricted

fields.name: IsTaxEffective
fields.description: Whether the effective date for the tax has been reached e.g. 1st Dec for NZ GST

fields.name: Location
fields.description: Longitude and Latitude of member's location. For now it's based on the "Closest town" information supplied by the member when creating their account.

fields.name: Latitude
fields.type:
Latitude 
 Number 

Latitude of the map point



 Longitude 
 Number 

Longitude of the map point
fields.description: Number

fields.description: Latitude of the map point

fields.name: Longitude
fields.description: Longitude of the map point

fields.name: PayNowStatus
fields.description: The status of the member's pay now account.

fields.name: SegmentUserId
fields.description: The member's Segment user ID.

fields.name: IsBasic
fields.description: Indicates the member has only registered with a small portion of information
